com.sleepysim

Class Honest_node

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sleepysim.Honest_node
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Node

    public class Honest_node
extends java.lang.Object
implements Node
    This class definds and operates the honest nodes. Run the honest nodes.
